com.yahoo.prelude.templates

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.prelude.templates.Context
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HitContext, MapContext

    public abstract class Context
extends Object
    A set of variable bindings for template rendering
    Author:
    bratseth

      • setXmlEscape

        public void setXmlEscape(boolean xmlEscape)
        Sets whether this context should xml-escape returned values

      • getXmlEscape

        public boolean getXmlEscape()
        Returns whether this context xml-escapes returned values. Default is true

      • put

        public abstract Object put(String key,
                           Object value)
        Makes a secondary binding
        Returns:
        the old value bound to this key, or null it the key was previously unbound

      • get

        public abstract Object get(String key)

        Returns a value by looking it up in the primary, and thereafter in secondary sources.

        If xml escaping is on and this is a string, xml attribute escaping is done

      • remove

        public abstract Object remove(Object key)
        Removes a secondary binding
        Returns:
        the removed value, or null if it wasn't bound

        public boolean isUtf8Output()
